install.name: DiaShow4 Module
install.author: Ralf weber
install.description: DiaShow4 Module - © 2009 by Ralf Weber - LoadBrain

param.name: hint
param.default: All pictures must have the same height and width!
param.label: IMPORTANT HINT
param.description: The width of the slideshow container (implied in px). Set it to accommodate the largest image within the slideshow

param.name: slideshow_width
param.label: width of the slideshow
param.description: All pictures must have the same height and width!

param.name: slideshow_height
param.label: height of the slideshow
param.description: All pictures must have the same height and width!

param.name: hintHeight
param.label: The heigth of the hint for the text
param.description: The heigth of the hint for the text

param.name: delay
param.label: Delay between image change, in milliseconds (ie: 3000 = 3 seconds)
param.description: Delay between image change, in milliseconds (ie: 3000 = 3 seconds)

param.name: optionalRandomOrder
param.label: Show pictures in random order
param.description: An optional parameter specifying whether to randomize the display order of the images. Set it to R to randomize, or remove this parameter (unset) to not.

param.name: showIt
param.label: Show the image in full size on triggering mousewheel while mouseover?

param.name: xPos
param.label: The xpos of the full image relative to the container
param.description: The xpos of the full image relative to the container

param.name: yPos
param.label: The ypos of the full image relative to the container
param.description: The ypos of the full image relative to the container

param.name: height
param.label: The height of the full image
param.description: The heigth of the full image

param.name: width
param.label: The width of the full image
param.description: The width of the full image

param.name: borderCss
param.label: The css for the hint to view the full image
param.description: The css for the hint to view the full image
